titleStmt.title: Things plain and weighty referred unto the consideration of both Houses of Parliament assembled at Westminster, March 25, 1690 that peace and happiness, truth and justice, religion and piety, may be established amongst us throughout all generations.
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Richard, 1663-1703.

editionStmt.edition: And now reprinted with the addition of more words of truth ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
